attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We need a leadership election to reestablish public confidence in the senior management of our struggling country.  Whilst an effective chancellor of the exchequor it is now clear that Brown is not suitable to represent our nation and its veiws.  Already former Health Secretary Patricia Hewitt has said Labour must set a bold new strategy and renew confidence in its economic competence.
Siobhain McDonagh was the first member of the government to call publicly for a leadership contest.
